Package org.team19

Class OpenPartyListSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team19.VotingSystem
      • org.team19.OpenPartyListSystem
  • public class OpenPartyListSystem
extends VotingSystem
    The VotingSystem representing the open party list voting system

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected static class  OpenPartyListSystem.PartyInformation
      Represents party information for a party in an OpenPartyListSystem election

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected PrintWriter auditWriter
      The writer to an output stream for the audit file to write detailed information about the running of the election
      protected Candidate[] candidates
      The array of Candidates for this election in the order presented in the election file
      protected int numBallots
      The number of ballots provided in this election
      protected int numCandidates
      The number of candidates in this election
      protected int numSeats
      The number of seats in this election

      A mapping of parties to a mapping of their candidates to their ballot counts
      protected Map<String,​OpenPartyListSystem.PartyInformation> partyToPartyInformation
      A mapping of parties to their respective OpenPartyListSystem.PartyInformation instance
      protected static Random rand
      Used for randomization in breaking ties
      protected PrintWriter reportWriter
      The writer to an output stream for the report file to write a summary about the running of the election.
      protected TableFormatter tableFormatter
      The TableFormatter used to produce tables as output

      • allocateInitialSeats

        protected Pair<Integer,​Set<String>> allocateInitialSeats​(Fraction quota)
        Allocates the initial seats using the quota
        Parameters:
        quota - The proportion of number of ballots to number of seats
        Returns:
        A Pair that contains the number of seats remaining after initial allocation and a Set of String representing the parties that still have candidates without seats

      • allocateRemainingSeats

        protected void allocateRemainingSeats​(int numSeatsRemaining,
                                      Set<String> remainingParties)
        Allocates remaining seats to parties with the highest remaining votes
        Parameters:
        numSeatsRemaining - Number of seats remaining after initial allocation
        remainingParties - Parties that still have enough candidates for additional seats

      • distributeSeatsToCandidates

        protected List<Candidate> distributeSeatsToCandidates()
        Distributes each party’s seats to their candidates by popularity
        Returns:
        a List containing the candidates who received seats

      • printFinalSeatAllocations

        protected void printFinalSeatAllocations()
        Prints a table contains all parties and the number of final seats allocated to each to audit file

      • printSummaryTable

        protected void printSummaryTable​(Map<String,​Integer> initialSeats)
        Prints the a summary table with each party's name, total ballots, seats from first allocation, remaining ballots after initial allocation, seats received from second allocation, total seats allocation, and percent of ballots to percent of seats to audit file, report file, and to screen.
        Parameters:
        initialSeats - a Map of parties to the number of seats each received during the initial allocation
